SteelwatchGuard.synopsis: The dialogue with Steel Watchers near the ship for Tadpole Transport booster. These watchers are guarding the ship and tell to go away.
SteelwatchGuard.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. goto -212; 1; -1343. Talk to steel watchers

AD_SteelwatchWarning.synopsis: A couple of steel watchers defend the Transport that came from MOO with some tadpoles in it. They will warn the players to move along

AD_NoticedIllusion.synopsis: After a successful skillcheck in a TadpoleTransport booster players notice the illusion. It's a narrator AD that is played on characters.

AD_WarningMessage.synopsis: A warning message about the guarded ship in docks (that contains tadpoles). Steel watchers are guarding this place and they will attack if characters will get close to the ship
AD_WarningMessage.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. goto -218; 4; -1373. Click on the board

SteelwatchGuard_0.speaker: GROUP_SteelWatchers
SteelwatchGuard_0.text: Halt, citizen. This is a restricted area.

SteelwatchGuard_1.speaker: GROUP_SteelWatchers
SteelwatchGuard_1.text: Trespassing in restricted areas is not tolerated, miscreant.

AD_SteelwatchWarning_0.speaker: GROUP_SteelWatchers
AD_SteelwatchWarning_0.text: Entrance prohibited. You will not be warned again.

AD_NoticedIllusion_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_NoticedIllusion_0.text: *A glint of light catches your eye - crates hidden by an illusion.*

AD_WarningMessage_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_WarningMessage_0.text: *This dock is closed until further notice by order of Lord Gortash.*
